meanings.definition: The quality or state of being quizzical.
meanings.sent1: Her constant quizzicalities always kept us entertained.
meanings.sent2: The quizzicalities of his expression made it hard to tell if he was serious or joking.
meanings.sent3: The quizzicalities of the situation left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: His quizzicalities were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The professor's quizzicalities made learning fun and engaging.

meanings.sent1: The old house had a quirky charm with its quizzicalities.
meanings.sent2: Her quizzicalities manner always made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat's quizzicalities behavior never failed to make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The painting's quizzicalities added an intriguing element to the room.
meanings.sent5: The quizzicalities design of the building caught everyone's attention.
